name: Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Final Sign Off

Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Material Compliace Check
Acceptance Criteria - Density > 2.6t/m3 when tested in accordance with NZS 4407 1991 Test 3.7.2
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Material Compliace Check
Acceptance Criteria - CR > 150kN when tested in accordance with NZS 4407 1991 Test 3.10
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Material Compliace Check
Acceptance Criteria - AA, BA, AB or BB when tested in accordance with NZS 4407 1991 Test 3.11
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Material Compliace Check
Acceptance Criteria - AR ≤ 26% when tested in accordance with NZS 4407 1991 Test 3.12
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Material Compliace Check
Acceptance Criteria - Rock shall be free from calcite intrusions and shall not be broken concrete or asphalt.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Material Compliance Check
Acceptance Criteria - Rock shall be nominal D50 size shown on the drawings and shall be well graded as follows.
Stone Size Range (m) || Stone Weight Range (kilograms) || % of Gradation smaller than
○ Please Add Bidim and AP150 Material Approval
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Pre placement inspection
Acceptance Criteria - Filter cloth to be placed and securly pegged prior to placement, material to comply as per NZTA F7.
Frequency - Once per Rip Rap bed
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Post construction inspection
Acceptance Criteria - Rip Rap to be placed by machine or hand and not dumped.
○ Placing to begin from the lowest point of bed in an unwatered state.
○ No deformation of underlying surface during placement.
○ Rocks should be placed so as not to deviate the bed/channel grade from the design drawings.
○ Rocks to be evenly distributed in size to lock togeather and minimise voids.
Frequency - Once per Rip Rap bed
